name: Lockup
overview: Lockup explore prison facilities throughout the United States, profiling notable inmates, incidents, and prison operations.

episodes.name: Inside Riverbend
episodes.overview: Riverbend Maximum Security Prison inmates tell their stories.

episodes.name: Return to Valley State
episodes.overview: Inmates of California's Valley State Prison for Women try rehabilitation.

episodes.name: Return to Rikers Island
episodes.overview: See how the once-infamous Rikers Island jail has reinvented itself.

episodes.name: Inside Utah State Prison
episodes.overview: Inside the largest maximum security facility in Salt Lake City. A "jail within a prison" protects some inmates from others.

episodes.name: Inside North Carolina Women's Prison
episodes.overview: Revealing of how these women deal with relationships and struggles.

episodes.name: Inside Kentucky State Penitentiary
episodes.overview: Behind the walls of Kentucky's only maximum security prison.

episodes.name: Inside Anamosa
episodes.overview: Inside the maximum security facility in Eastern Iowa.

episodes.name: Return to Pelican Bay
episodes.overview: One of the most violent and volatile penitentiaries in the nation.

episodes.name: Return to Corcoran
episodes.overview: The Corcoran State Prison, located in an isolated valley, is one of California's largest maximum-security institutions.

episodes.name: Inside Wabash
episodes.overview: California's Kern Valley State Prison opens its doors in 2005.

episodes.name: Inside Miami-Dade Corrections
episodes.overview: Miami's prison system.

episodes.name: Inside The Penitentiary of New Mexico
The Inmate Diaries
episodes.overview: Oklahoma inmates tell their own remarkable stories.

episodes.name: Inside Stateville
episodes.overview: Half of Chicago's Stateville Correctional Center's inmates are imprisoned for murder.

episodes.name: Inside LA County Jail
episodes.overview: LA County Jail is a system that is overcrowded, tough on gangs, and struggling with an increase in racial violence.

episodes.name: Inside Folsom Prison
episodes.overview: Inside the maximum security prison inmates call 'the end of the world.'

episodes.name: Inside San Quentin
episodes.overview: A profile of San Quentin State Prison in California; one of the most famous, most notorious penitentiaries in the world.

episodes.name: Inside Kern Valley
episodes.overview: California's Kern Valley State Prison opens its doors in 2005.

episodes.name: Inside Holman Correctional Facility
episodes.overview: Alabama's Holman maximum security prison.

episodes.name: San Quentin: Extended Stay - The Gang's All Here
episodes.overview: The violent history of San Quentin State Prison in California.

episodes.name: Extended Stay: Killing Time
episodes.overview: Inmates at San Quentin State Prison find ways to fight boredom.

episodes.name: San Quentin: Extended Stay - The Conjugal Visit
episodes.overview: Inmates receive visitors during their prison stays.

episodes.name: San Quentin: Extended Stay - Bad Boys, Bad Boys
episodes.overview: A dangerous combination of gangs, drugs and boredom encourages inmates to commit violent offenses in prison.

episodes.name: San Quentin: Extended Stay - Weapons 101
episodes.overview: A 20-year-old inmate speaks about how he grew up on the streets and what motivates him to turn his life around.

episodes.name: San Quentin: Extended Stay - Slammin' in the Slammer
episodes.overview: The prison's annual poetry slam.

episodes.name: Holman: Extended Stay - He Takes No Prisoners
episodes.overview: Grantt Culliver controls the disruptive inmates of Holman Correctional Facility.

episodes.name: Holman: Extended Stay - Locked Up Love
episodes.overview: Relationships both inside and outside the prison walls.

episodes.name: Holman: Extended Stay - Snake and Fluffy
episodes.overview: Dangerous inmates are segregated from the rest of the prison population.

episodes.name: Holman: Extended Stay - The Shakedown
episodes.overview: Correctional officers search prisoners for weapons.

episodes.name: Holman: Extended Stay - Til Death Do Us Part
episodes.overview: Serving life sentences or death sentences in prison.

episodes.name: Holman: Extended Stay - You Wanna Work Where?
episodes.overview: Unexcused absences create staff shortages at Alabama's Holman Correctional Facility.

episodes.name: Raw: Criminal Minds
episodes.overview: Nine of the most violent criminals from the 'Lockup' series give chilling accounts of their crimes.

episodes.name: Raw: Hell in a Cell
episodes.overview: Inmates must develop methods to cope with the pressures and fear that come with incarceration.

episodes.name: Raw: Violence Behind Bars
episodes.overview: Inmate violence including riots, shanks and attacks on officers.

episodes.name: Raw: Convict Code
episodes.overview: Inmates' unwritten rules known as the Convict Code.

episodes.name: Raw: Ever Present Danger
episodes.overview: On a regular basis camera crew explore where even the most heinous violations are an every day activity.

episodes.name: Raw: Prison Love
episodes.overview: Intimacy in prison.

episodes.name: Raw: The Daily Grind
episodes.overview: The daily grind of prison life has been known to push some inmates to the brink.

episodes.name: Raw: The Devil's Workshop
episodes.overview: Idle time leads to mischief in prison.

episodes.name: Corcoran: Extended Stay - Love and Hate
Corcoran: Extended Stay - Everyone Gets Got
episodes.overview: Known gang members are sent to security housing units to control their activity.

episodes.name: Corcoran: Extended Stay - Prison Politices
episodes.overview: Corcoran officers put their lives on the line to prevent inmate attacks.

episodes.name: Corcoran: Extended Stay - Hugs Not Drugs
episodes.overview: Inmates find various ways to smuggle in contraband.

episodes.name: Corcoran: Extended Stay - Lockdown
episodes.overview: Survival is the number one priority for inmates and officers alike inside Corcoran.

episodes.name: Corcoran: Extended Stay - Road to Redemption
episodes.overview: Inmates must choose between doing their time or following a more self-destructive path.

episodes.name: Raw: Inmates Gone Wild
episodes.overview: There is never a dull moment in prison.

episodes.name: Raw: Americas Thoughest Jails
episodes.overview: Three of America's busiest and largest jails.

episodes.name: Raw: Hard Time
episodes.overview: Inmates with nothing left to lose.

episodes.name: Raw: Friend or Foe
episodes.overview: In prison, knowing the right answers could mean the difference between life and death.

episodes.name: New Mexico: Extended Stay - Taking a Hostage
episodes.overview: Prisoners take hostages in the Penitentiary of New Mexico.

episodes.name: New Mexico: Extended Stay - Pros and Cons
episodes.overview: Inmates land longer sentences due to bad behavior.

episodes.name: New Mexico: Extended Stay - Fight or Flight
episodes.overview: The dangerous inmates of Level Six in the Penitentiary of New Mexico.

episodes.name: New Mexico: Extended Stay - Institutionalized
episodes.overview: Inmates who become disruptive or violent are transferred to the lock-up units in levels five and six.

episodes.name: New Mexico: Extended Stay - War
episodes.overview: Prison officials initiate a shakedown after gang members in Level 6 overpower an officer in the recreation area, take her keys and stab a rival gang member.

episodes.name: New Mexico: Extended Stay - Get Out and Stay Out
episodes.overview: Some inmates leave prison by 'paroling legit' or in a body bag and others earn time for early parole, but a few will attempt escape.

episodes.name: Raw: Killers Among Us
episodes.overview: The experience of interviewing violent offenders in prison.

episodes.name: Raw: Survival 101
episodes.overview: An inmate feels his survival depends on staying in prison; prison food.

episodes.name: Raw: Ganging Up
episodes.overview: Joining a gang while in prison.

episodes.name: Raw: Time to Kill
episodes.overview: How inmates spend their time in jail.

episodes.name: Indiana State Prison: Extended Stay - Old School Convicts
episodes.overview: A stabbing puts the prison on high alert; a brash new inmate gets taken down a notch.

episodes.name: Indiana State Prison: Extended Stay - Tipped Off
episodes.overview: An anonymous tip puts Internal Affairs on high alert.

episodes.name: Indiana State Prison: Extended Stay - Cutting
episodes.overview: The many meanings of 'cutting' at Indiana State Prison.

episodes.name: Indiana State Prison: Extended Stay - For Better or For Worse
episodes.overview: Contraband finds its way to the inmates.

episodes.name: Indiana State Prison: Extended Stay - Brotherhood
episodes.overview: The Residential Treatment Unit.

episodes.name: Indiana State Prison: Extended Stay - Predator & Prey
episodes.overview: Some prisoners resort to violence while others become victims.

episodes.name: Limon Colorado: Extended Stay - There Goes The Neighborhood
episodes.overview: While visiting Limon Correctional, the Lockup crew is greeted by angry inmates and the cell extraction team is called in to help.

episodes.name: Limon Colorado: Extended Stay - Crackdown
episodes.overview: Behind the walls of six maximum-security prison in Serbia, Poland, and the Czech Republic.

episodes.name: Limon Colorado: Extended Stay - The Hustle
episodes.overview: Life inside prisons throughout Scotland and Belgium.

episodes.name: Limon Colorado: Extended Stay - Homecoming
episodes.overview: Extractions at Colorado State Penitentiary.

episodes.name: Limon Colorado: Extended Stay - Pain
episodes.overview: Violence at the Limon Correctional Facility in Colorado.

episodes.name: Limon Colorado: Extended Stay - Love Hurts
Tennessee Women's Prison
episodes.overview: Tennessee Prison for Women along the banks of the Cumberland River is home to more than 700 inmates.

episodes.name: Raw: Predatory Behavior
episodes.overview: Five notorious inmates reveal insights into their predatory behavior.

episodes.name: Raw: Never a Dull Moment
episodes.overview: Long periods of monotony are broken up by brief moments of terror.

episodes.name: Raw: Livin' the Life
episodes.overview: Adapting to life in American prisons.

episodes.name: Raw: Pushing the Limits
episodes.overview: In a life full of restrictions, we've seen inmates take control of whatever they can, despite the consequences. We've seen frustrated inmates reach their breaking point. And in the battle of wills, some will take actions that can never be reversed.

episodes.name: Raw: The Killer Next Door
episodes.overview: Every murder has a motive and often the murder is committed by the least likely person.

episodes.name: Raw: The Revolving Door
episodes.overview: Three inmates prepare to cross the threshold to freedom.

episodes.name: Raw: Hardcore
episodes.overview: The most extreme Lockup stories ever. These are the prison stories best described by one word. And the word is... HARDCORE.

episodes.name: Raw: Dues and Don't
episodes.overview: In prison, as on the outside, a single decision can change a persons life forever. And we've seen inmates make all kinds of fateful choices. But behind bars, there is no escaping the consequences of one's actions.

episodes.name: Maricopa County: Extended Stay - Daddy's Girl
episodes.overview: A female housing unit inmates call a party house will turn a new inmates life upside down.

episodes.name: Maricopa County: Extended Stay - Chain Reaction
episodes.overview: Located on the top floor of Maricopa County's Fourth Avenue Jail Facility, are the highest-security male housing units. These inmates have either committed violent acts in the jail or have been identified as gang members. And like all inmates at Maricopa, some are awaiting trial while others have been convicted and are appealing their verdicts or sentences. They are isolated in very stark cells 23 hours a day and get one hour of rec time in an empty concrete room with a skylight located right next door to their cells. Without the distraction of television, radio or a cellmate, even the most hardened criminals can break under the pressure. One gang member makes a desperate cry for help by putting a noose around his neck, then says, "I just need somebody to talk to." And on the other side of the jail, completely isolated from other inmates, Maricopa's four most dangerous women form a notorious sisterhood

episodes.name: Maricopa County: Extended Stay - Heat Wave
episodes.overview: Behind the bars of Maricopa County Jail in Phoenix, run by controversial figure in the immigration battle.

episodes.name: Maricopa County: Extended Stay - High Stakes
episodes.overview: In one of Maricopa's primary men's facilities, the Fourth Avenue Jail, when inmates are not in their small, two-person cells, they can work out in an indoor rec room, or in the common area between their cells. But every afternoon, many of the inmates shift focus from their bodies to their bank accounts. Since inmates are not allowed access to cash, they have another way to pay gambling debts. The losers must purchase snacks or other items from the jail canteen for the winners. They pay for canteen through debit accounts that friends or relatives on the outside deposit money into. But a losing hand can bring serious consequences.

episodes.name: Maricopa County: Extended Stay - Identity Crisis
episodes.overview: No matter the circumstances that brought them there, Maricopa County Jail in Phoenix, Arizona, will have a profound effect on who the inmates will become. And for some, their time in jail will reveal their true nature.

episodes.name: Maricopa County: Extended Stay - Trials and Tribulations
episodes.overview: A world where tensions run high especially for a mother and son who were accused of a heinous murder.

episodes.name: Raw: Doomed Decisions
episodes.overview: Producers take the time to get to know dozens of inmates, following the action and watching the story unfold in from of their eyes.

episodes.name: Raw: Harsh Reality
episodes.overview: Sometimes life has other plans, like when the ex leader of a gang faces a whole new reality he discovers the price for coming clean.

episodes.name: Raw: Consequences
episodes.overview: No escaping the consequences of one's actions behind bars.

episodes.name: Raw: The Three R's
episodes.overview: Sometimes life has other plans, like when the ex-leader of a white supremacist gang faces a whole new reality, and discovers the price for coming clean.

episodes.name: Raw: It's Complicated
episodes.overview: Relationships on the inside can be more complicated than on the outside.

episodes.name: Raw: Nothing But Time
episodes.overview: In prison time can be an inmates worst enemy.

episodes.name: Raw: Ain't No Hotel
episodes.overview: America's Toughest Jail where we find stories that ranged from the unexpected to horrifying.

episodes.name: Raw: A Private Hell
episodes.overview: For some prison might be hell and it can be even worse for the sex offenders.

episodes.name: Orange County Jail Extended Stay: The Confession
Orange County Jail: Extended Stay - Wake Up Call
episodes.overview: Inside Orange County Jail confinement takes a dark turn for a light-hearted teenager, but provides a new beginning for an old bank robber, and a mother who has put drugs before her son gets another chance.

episodes.name: Life After Lockup: Komyatti, Slagle, and Tye
episodes.overview: Follow the lives of inmates after they have left prison who have been previously featured on the show.

episodes.name: Orange County Jail: Extended Stay - Murder and Miracles
Orange County Jail: Extended Stay - Unholy Trinity
Orange County Jail: Extended Stay - Highs and Lows
Orange County Jail: Extended Stay - Cabin Fever
Boston: Extended Stay - Blood Brothers
episodes.overview: Over the past ten years, the structure of local gangs has changed and that's had a serious impact on the Suffolk County jail. In this hour: an inmate takes his fights from the street to the halls of the jail, and his boyhood friend follows his example; two brothers turn to crime to support their habits, and now one faces the prospect of hitting the streets again.

episodes.name: Boston: Extended Stay - The Box Life
episodes.overview: Boston, Massachusetts is by any standard a world-class city. But ever since its colonial days, some have called it a fighting town. And located in the heart of the city is a place for anyone who does their fighting outside a ring. More than 12,000 people a year pass through the doors of Boston's Suffolk County Jail. And with an average daily population of 2,700 male and female inmates, someone reaches their boiling point virtually every day of the week. For those inmates all too willing to throw a punch... the jail has a special place: The Box. As one inmate says, "Separated from everything so you learn to deal with it. It's called 'The Box Life'."

episodes.name: Boston: Extended Stay - Feel, Deal, Heal
episodes.overview: Many inmates use their time in jail to get clean off drugs and get their lives on the right path. Others, however, simply can’t wait return to the dangerous lifestyle of the streets.

episodes.name: Boston: Extended Stay - Family Jewels
episodes.overview: While Boston, Massachusetts maintains its colonial past, it's ranked as one of the world's leading metropolitan areas for education and innovation. In the heart of downtown, however, is a reminder that not everyone is on the right track. In this hour: an old school bank robber maintains his swagger; an inmate with an imaginary friend proves to be a challenge for the jail, and a shocking act lands his sister behind bars, as well.

episodes.name: Boston: Extended Stay - Bad Rep
episodes.overview: An inmate attempts to change his reputation. Another inmate, desperate for a transfer, acts out with his urine and feces. A man awaiting trial for possession of child pornography receives a visit from his daughter.

episodes.name: Boston: Extended Stay - Baptism by Fire
episodes.overview: Inmates at the Suffolk County Jail look forward to mealtimes, often for reasons that have nothing to do with the food.  Watch how jail dining hours erupt into chaos on this episode.

episodes.name: Tampa: Extended Stay - High Profile
episodes.overview: In prison for the murder of a lottery winner, Dee Dee Moore discusses her hopes for the future - including a Disney-style fairytale wedding.

episodes.name: Tampa: Extended Stay - Supply and Demand
episodes.overview: While facing the consequences of dealing drugs, Michael Garcia re-evaluates his outlook on life, developing a connection with God and strengthening his relationship with his family.

episodes.name: Tampa: Extended Stay - Mother Knows Best?
episodes.overview: Jason Flores was the victim of a horrible crime as a child. Now an adult, serving time himself, he is surprised to meet up behind bars with the man who raped him as a child. He tells us what happened....

episodes.name: Tampa: Extended Stay - The Company You Keep
episodes.overview: Ex-couple Rosanna DiMauro and Kasey Ackerman plead not guilty to a violent crime in which a man was burned alive. Watch as they explain their sides of the story.

episodes.name: Tampa: Extended Stay - Bitter Pills
episodes.overview: In this hour, an inmate with a long record runs an extortion scheme, while drugs inside the jail pose a lethal threat. And the jail's newest team member makes her presence known.

episodes.name: Tampa: Extended Stay - You Feel Me?

Wabash Valley: Extended Stay - We Fight
Wabash Valley: Extended Stay - Close Quarters
Wabash Valley: Extended Stay - Da Future
Wabash Valley: Extended Stay - Father Figure
Santa Rosa: Extended Stay - Blood Lines
Santa Rosa: Extended Stay - The Wrong Fight
episodes.overview: Meet Danny Pritchett, who has a history of being a predatory inmate, both inside and outside of prison. He was transferred to Santa Rosa after proving to be too much to handle at other Florida state prisons.

episodes.name: Santa Rosa: Extended Stay - Troubled Waters
Santa Rosa: Extended Stay - You Reap What You Sow
Santa Rosa: Extended Stay - The Damage Done
Life After Lockup: Boltjes, Wrinkles, Gill, and Gilbert
episodes.overview: Bobby Ray Gilbert is easily one of the most volatile inmates to ever appear on Lockup. Is it possible that he has discovered true love? David Boltjes ranks as one of the most talked-about inmates featured on Lockup, but now he's out of prison and his tattooed eyeballs continue to ...

episodes.name: Louisville: Extended Stay - Lightning Voltz
episodes.overview: A lunchtime dispute turns violent in the first episode of the series about life inside the Louisville Metro Department of Corrections. Also: One inmate learns hard truths about crime and jail while another prepares to be set free.

episodes.name: Louisville: Extended Stay - Horribility
episodes.overview: An inmate behaves erratically; an accused murderer faces the death penalty while his girlfriend is being held in the women's wing; a new female inmate raises havoc; a raid catches an inmate by surprise.

episodes.name: Louisville: Extended Stay - Enough Is Enough
episodes.overview: A repeat offender tries to smuggle contraband into the jail; an inmate is targeted for allegedly killing a local rap star; prescription drug abuse becomes epidemic; an inmate's drug abuse may keep him in jail; officials fret about one inmate's influence.

episodes.name: Louisville: Extended Stay - Bam Bam
episodes.overview: An inmate's actions lead to an emergency response; a repeat offender accused of assaulting her mother relies on her daughter for support; an inmate focuses on his brain; another inmate is accused of an unthinkable act.

episodes.name: Louisville: Extended Stay - Miss Fortune
episodes.overview: A troubled inmate tries to make an impression; another inmate acts out; a woman who gave birth in the jail watches her baby grow up without her; an inmate faces a 25 years-to-life sentence.

episodes.name: Louisville: Extended Stay - Next of Kin
episodes.overview: An officer is assaulted; inmates try to escape; a young woman finds a surrogate mother on the inside; an inmate not known for making trouble issues a vile threat. Also: a cautionary tale for fathers and sons

episodes.name: San Antonio: Extended Stay - X'd Out
episodes.overview: A celebrity rapper enters the Santa Rita jail; brothers deal with gangs, drugs and parenthood; a three-time convicted murderer claims he's killed others as well.

episodes.name: San Antonio: Extended Stay - Defiance
episodes.overview: Gang members cause chaos in a housing unit, forcing SERT to step in to restore order and place an inmate in special restraints; a female prisoner threatens the staff; and a gang member accrues more charges while locked up.

episodes.name: San Antonio: Extended Stay - Words of a Warrior
episodes.overview: A two-on-one assault leaves an inmate bloodied; a self-avowed Satanist runs a variety of inmate hustles.

episodes.name: San Antonio: Extended Stay - Carry That Weight
episodes.overview: An inmate causes chaos after accusing the staff of abuse; one inmate claims jail saved his life; the inmates of two female housing unites face off.

episodes.name: San Antonio: Extended Stay - A House Divided
episodes.overview: Former gang members try to put their rivalries behind them, but not all can let go of the past; a contraband raid turns a housing unit upside down.

episodes.name: San Antonio: Extended Stay - Love Sick
episodes.overview: An inmate's mail has jail officials concerned; an inmate is charged with sexually molesting his brother's daughter

Charleston: Extended Stay - Tempt Not a Desperate Man

Savannah: Extended Stay - Outlaws and In-Laws
episodes.overview: Five miles from the riverfront hotels and restaurants of Savannah, Georgia, is a more ominous site, a place where an inmate is severely injured and a friendship is torn; two soon to be brothers-in-law are accused of double homicide.

episodes.name: Savannah: Extended Stay - Wis-dumb
episodes.overview: A young couple's plans for a romantic weekend end in a nightmare; segregation awaits two women involved in a fight, driving one of them mad; just another day at the Chatham County Detention Center.

episodes.name: Savannah: Extended Stay - Hard on the Yard
episodes.overview: One man prepares for life behind bars after running someone down with his car; another man must be placed in isolation for his own protection, after being accused of knowingly giving women HIV.

episodes.name: Savannah: Extended Stay - Notorius
episodes.overview: The Chatham County Detention Center hosts an inmate who faces a life sentence for murdering his spouse; another inmate's illegal business stands in the way of him graduating from the jail's strict substance abuse program.

episodes.name: Savannah: Extended Stay - Back in Orange
episodes.overview: An inmate is tested when he returns to general population after spending months in the segregation unit; an inmate charged with violent crime outside of jail turns violent inside; another inmate vows to do damage because he feels like an outcast.

episodes.name: Savannah: Extended Stay - Savannah: Blood Lines
Raw: A Young Person's Guide to Jail
Sacramento: Extended Stay - 352,955 Days to Life
Sacramento: Extended Stay - The Eyes Have It
